item.title: Airline profits hit turbulence from Q1’s ‘parade of horribles’
item.description: TD Cowen analysts expect airline stocks to remain volatile.

item.title: Treasury yields edge up after CPI inflation data comes in cooler than expected
item.description: Bond yields turned higher Wednesday after the consumer-price index report for February came in cooler than Wall Street expected.

item.title: Why it’s harder for Generation X to save for retirement than it was for baby boomers
item.description: The next generation of retirees isn’t feeling so confident about the future

item.title: Goldman Sachs flinches and lowers its S&P 500 target. The mechanics are the interesting part.
item.description: It’s been tough for Wall Street strategists to hold their nerve in the face of the ever-changing tariff policy.

item.title: Believe in Elon Musk’s $1 trillion ‘waste and fraud’ jackpot when you see it
item.description: Musk is right about one thing: Absolutely no reasonable person should support waste or fraud in the federal government
